content.rendered:
For the month of November,

we did something special and held a sticker based donation campaign! We’re very passionate about using our voice and raising money for charities who are doing awesome work, and the first charity we chose was the Honeybee Conservancy. They work to create habitats for bees, bring bee education to schools and communities, and partner with gardens and urban farms to help build a greener, more sustainable world. We love the work that they do!

 

The artwork for the stickers come from a High School senior project who created a variety of stickers to back different charities. More info can be found here. We loved their artwork so much that we reached out and explained about wanting to do a donation drive and they agreed! They are still raising money so if you missed out on getting a sticker through us, you can purchase one from them.

 


 

We happy to announce that we raised $175 to be donated to the Honeybee Conservancy!

 

Thank you all who purchased a sticker! We love getting to connect the world of sticker making and art, and combing it with helping charities who are passionate about what they do! This is the first of many sticker based donation campaigns, stay connected with our Facebook and Instagram to keep posted about our next one.

 

Do you have art that you’d like to donate to a charitable cause? We’d love to work with you! Contact us here and tell us your idea 🙂

 

xoxo,

Sticker Ninja
